tool_description: API to retrieve the IP address of the user in different formats.
title: Arul IP Address API

api_list.name: getiptext
api_list.description: Retrieve the user's IP address in plain text format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api.aruljohn.com/ip"

response = requests.get(url)

print(response.text.strip())

api_list.name: getipjson
api_list.description: Retrieve the user's IP address in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api.aruljohn.com/ip/json"

response = requests.get(url)

print(response.json())
